metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.code:
module

mymodule

{


exports

content.code_html:
module mymodule {
  exports com.w3schools.package1;
  exports com.w3Schools.package2 to module1, module2;
}

content.text: The exports keyword allows a package from a module to be used by other modules.
content.html: The exports keyword allows a package from a module to be used by other modules.

content.text: If the to keyword is added, the exported package is only allowed to be used by the modules that are listed.
content.html: If the to keyword is added, the exported package is only allowed to be used by the modules that are listed.

content.text: Note: The exports keyword is a module directive meant to be used in the module-info.java file of a module.
content.html: Note: The exports keyword is a module directive meant to be used in the module-info.java file of a module.

content.text: The exports keyword was new in Java 9.
